snippet: The gun lobby propaganda is convincing lawmakers that the 10-year ban on assault weapons was ineffective.
abstract: Editorial laments that Senate Judiciary Committee members seem to have largely swallowed gun lobby propaganda and concluded that 10-year ban on assault weapons was ineffective; contends that Pres Obama must fight hard for maximum public involvement if assault weapons ban is ever to have chance in Congress.
lead_paragraph: The gun lobby propaganda is convincing lawmakers that the 10-year ban on assault weapons was ineffective.
